CONTACT.TEXT-2: Register to our newsletter and be updated with the latests information regarding our services, offers and much more.

HEADER.HEAD-9: What if I don't like coach's teaching?
HEADER.HEAD-10: What to do if student/coach try to contact personally?
HEADER.FREE: PROMOTION! Free matching fee for coach during our opening period until end of November

PAR.PAR-WHY: MatchTheCoach is a platform for you to find teacher or tutor in any field. We provide variety of teachers in many subjects, included their profiles. You can choose the most suitable one for you or your kids judging from the specialist and experience of the teacher.
PAR.PAR-BETTER: Many of education agency wouldn't provide you a choice, you get what they choose. Also sometimes you have to pay for the course to the agency, which they would deduct 50% from teacher. MatchTheCoach let you choose teacher by your self. we can give an advice, but you are the one who choose. You also pay the course fee to the teacher directly, so they will get what they should get.
PAR.PAR-1: The pricing occur in this service is called 'Matching fee'.
PAR.PAR-2:
The matching fee cost is 20% (Reduce price 50%! - we know that education is important) to only 10% of the course's price, both from a coach and student.

Example : If the course is 10 hours, with a price 480 Baht/hour. The matching fee will be 480 Baht

SALE! during festive seasons

Student: no matchinf fee. ALL FREE!!


The matching fee will be calculated and send to you via Email when there's a matching request.

For teacher/Coach: Minimum matching fee is 490 Baht for the course that less than 5,000 Baht
PAR.PAR-3:
You can think that a matching fee is like a deposit. If a coach or student cancel before a course too sudden(< 48 hours),
You will get a matching fee back.

*Plus* if the cancellation made on the day of the course, you'll get your fee back, plus half of the other side's fee.

Example: You already paid matching fee 500 Baht, but you get a cancellation phone call in the morning day of starting course.
You will get 500 Baht back + 250 Baht. So totally you will get 750 Baht.
PAR.PAR-4: The matching fee price will be sent via an Email
PAR.PAR-6-1: For Student: Transfer<mark> when you get an Email confirmation.</mark>
PAR.PAR-6-2: For Coach/ Teacher : Transfer<mark> after the student already transfer</mark>, we will send you a second Email when the time come.
PAR.PAR-6-3: After you transfer,<mark> please reply an Email with a transfer document</mark> back to us.
PAR.PAR-7: Please do a transfer process within 7 days after you got a confirmation Email
PAR.PAR-8: Cancellation would not cost anything if made it before the course at least 2 days. If you canceled within 48 hours, you will not get the matching fee back.
PAR.PAR-9: If you think the coach's teaching is not your style, or you feel not right. You can ask us to change the coach. If you would like to cancel the course, please inform us after finish the class as soon as possible. We will refund your matching fee back right away.
PAR.PAR-10-1: We recommend that you shouldn't accept or contact each other personally outside the web. We concerned about your securit and personal informations most. You also loss many benefits that will occuring, and loss the cancellation protection.
PAR.PAR-10-2: Please report to us if someone try to contact you personally before the matching done

HEAD.PRIVACY: We respect your privacy and personal data most. No sensitive data will provide to public without asking for permission.
HEAD.COURSE-HEAD: Create a course/ Edit a course
HEAD.RECOMMEND: You can provide multiple language info if you want to match other language speaking students

LABEL.NAME: Name
LABEL.SUBJECT: Subject
LABEL.SHARE: You can copy this Url to post on FB to share for your friends!
LABEL.GOAL: What you wantto gainfrom this course?
LABEL.CREATE-COURSE: You MUST fill in 'create course' form after complete this subscription. The link can be found in menu bar or profile page.

TEXT.PIC: Please wait picture to Load and Submit the picture before continue fill in the form.
TEXT.POPOVER: You should create the actual course length, not too few. It may effect coach's trustability. Also student may stop learning early than your plan, because there was no commitment how long the course should take.
TEXT.PICTURE: Picture is very important to impress the students You can upload or change it later in Profile > Edit course.

PLACEHOLD.CAT: Choose from a menu or create new. If not sure, put in 'others'.
PLACEHOLD.KEYWORD: ex. TOEFL Jazz primary fun etc.

PROFILE.TEXT-1: Please provide us a photo or copy of your ID card or passport, and criminal record check.
PROFILE.TEXT-2: Benefit to increase your credit and rate of matching.
PROFILE.CHECK: You didn't create any course yet. You can create a new course from a 'Course' menu in the bottom.
PROFILE.ALERT: Please fill in contact detail and subscription form first before create a course
